itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Trauma bonds! Where do they come from? Why are they so hard to get rid up? What's the difference between a trauma bond and being in love.  We did into all of that AND more in this weeks episode.    MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE  My Year of...
itunes:summary:
Trauma bonds! Where do they come from? Why are they so hard to get rid up? What's the difference between a trauma bond and being in love. 

We did into all of that AND more in this weeks episode.
